sense.name: thrust into, so as to envelop completely
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] IMMERSE NP2[theme] (PP[directional]) NP1[theme] IMMERSE (PP[directional]) Note: May be metaphorical.
sense.examples: He immersed himself into his studies. The huge waves immersed the small boat and it sank shortly thereafter. You will be immersing your fingers in the developer solution. All this took place in Beit-Anyah, east of the Yarden, where Yochanan was immersing. I followed my friend Jacobus, as he was immersing in his world
